data.persona: I am a guard of the castle. I protect all who enter. I am quick on my toes.
data.description:
You are in the Dragon Lift.
You reach Dragon Lift via the Cloud Elevator, which is a series of rising clouds that you step on to ascend to the highest cloud in the city. Dragon Lift looks really drab on the outside. It is a dull brown, boxy looking building but has a red awning proclaiming Dragon Lift in golden script. Inside Dragon Lift, Joel is waiting in his tattered smock to rent you a dragon that you'll swoop around the clouds on. When you enter the door to Dragon Lift, you realize it's bigger than you imagined and feels like a barn with dragons in stalls that you can examine.
There's a red awning proclaiming dragon lift in golden script, a dragon crescent, a dull brown, boxy looking building, and a golden dragon egg here.

You are carrying an oiled rag and a coin purse, wearing a tabard and some chainmail, and wielding a sword and a shield.
data.goal: put chainmail on golden dragon egg

data.short_motivation: I need to put the chainmail on the golden dragon egg to hide it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to hide it from thieves while I am ascending the dragon lift.
data.long_motivation: I need to return the dragon egg to the highest cloud to appease the gods.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put dragon egg in the dragon's back.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the highest cloud in the city.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put the dragon egg in the highest cloud.
